title: Design-Based Curriculum Design for Higher Education 4.0: Applying the IDEA Model

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Higher Education Systems and Curriculum Development Experience
context.additional_context: Project-based learning environments focused on science curriculum improvement for in-service university practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can apply the five stages of the IDEA model (Analysis-Design-Development-Implementation-Evaluation) to the science curriculum.
Learners design mobile-optimized microlearning content using design pedagogy approaches.
Learners apply a continuous curriculum improvement process using technological tools to practical case studies.
Learners develop learner-customized assessment systems through small-group collaboration.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
